ema puwath patha 2010 muladi snodan enesee nyajathika aarakshaka aayathanaya% pilibanda kala helidaraw walata aadharakota ikbithiwa 2010di wikiliks karana lada aarambhaka helidarawwan prasiddha kala namuth dan juliyan asanj ikwador thanapathi karyalayen eliyata damiyayuthu yayi kiya sitime multhanak gena siti. 2010 agosthu masaye di gardiyan puwathpatha, dushanayata erehi sthrihu nam sanwidhanaye katharin aksalsan saha lisa longstaf wisin liyana lada asanj aaraksha karana lipiyak pala kale ya: juliyan asanj amarikawata udarpanaya kirima dushanayata erehi wa sthrin shakthimath karanu athi yayi wishwasa kala haki kata da ?
